response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Considering its exceptional attributes and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $15,000. I trust this price reflects the product's superior value and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 15000}
